title: Changing an add-on icon color?
content:
Hello!

I have just installed the Simple Tab Groups add-on and moved it to tab bar (using the Customize menu), but unfortunately its icon remains black since it is an add-on, so it doesn't have a gray/white variant like the the native Firefox buttons. Since I use the default theme in Firefox my tab bar is black all the time (and I need/want to keep it that way) so what I'd like to do is just recolor the Simple Tab Groups add-on icon myself. I just have no idea where the icon data is stored and how I could do so.

Help is appreciated!

-FB-Productions
creator: FB-Productions

title: Firefox Slow and Boring
content:
So, as announced yesterday, I replaced Firefox with Opera and these were worlds! Firefox Slow and Boring ( Especially after last update ) Call for new pages only by right-clicking on new tab possible direct call infinitely long or not possible. Have already tried all the ways I can repair Firefox Edge and Opera run at the same calls many times better and faster. For these reasons I will now part with Firefox after a long time ! PS: Since version 50+ it actually got worse and worse, so now long enough written bye bye.

Gruß

Karl-Heinz
creator: k-mursal

title: Live videos unable to play on firefox.
content: Hello, today i reinstalled firefox as I have added an SSD in my pc. But from yesterday, firefox is unable to view any live videos on any platform.(Normal uploaded videos are playing) I searched for some help but none of them worked. I checked my browser's version,time and date,necessary hardware requirements. I am using windows 10 pro, Mozilla Firefox version 85.0.2(64-bit). I request you to please help me with this.Thanking you in anticipation. (Please note: Earlier I was able to play live videos as well as normal videos on all sites)

title: Function Address caused a protection fault
content:
Ever since my last update/upgrade I get the following message if I try and access my printer properties in Firefox and only Firefox, every other browser does not have an issue.

Function Address 0x000000018007260C caused a protection fault. (exception code 0xc0000005) Some or all property page(s) may not be displayed.

title: acesso a plataforma oracle
content: meu oracle nao passa da tela que tem essa mensagem : In order to access this application, you must install the J2SE Plugin version 1.7.0_51. To install this plugin, click here to download the oaj2se.exe executable. Once the download is complete, double-click the oaj2se.exe file to install the plugin. You will be prompted to restart your browser when the installation is complete. no entanto tenho java 7 instalado e o mozila firefox 49.0.2 instalados. Como posso proceder?
creator: lourinaldojose

title: Does anyone know how to make Firefox warn me when I hit Close on a single tab?
content: Does anyone know how to make Firefox warn me when I hit Close on a single tab? Occasionally I accidentally hit the "X" on a single tab that I didn't intend to close. I've searched Help with [warn close "single tab"] but very apparent that putting 2 words in quotes does NOT require them to be together in the search. It returns 106 pages! I saw that it was do-able in older versions of Firefox but since they changed the field to True or False you can't put a 2 in it. I think Firefox is great except for this very irritating flaw. Thank you..
creator: PGannon
